attributes.action: make the redundancy of offshore workers a priority over British citizens, who work in like for like job roles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the British Government to force companies to make Offshore Redundancies a priority over UK redundancies, when the job in question is like for like.

For example; A company would have to make someone working as a call center advisor offshore redundant before they would make a British citizen in the same job role redundant.

This would help the UK economy by keeping jobs in the UK.
